title: Google Play Review
body: Horrible delivery services by swiggy, the guy was expecting more for delivery when refused he asked to cancel the order, we opt to cancel since the delivery guy wasn't worth to pay extra for his attitude.. They made us wait for 60-70 mins and customer teams has no resolution option, horrible services

body: Never order paneer tikka from JB's Fancy Bazar, Guwahati. They will send you a burnt rotten paneer tikka for Rs.345 and Swiggy won't give give you refund when you raise an issue. Pathetic support from Swiggy! No response on reminder mails also.

title: Google Play Review
body: Got spoiled nandus meat delivered from Instamart wewere shocked,the stink from the pac was allover the house, spoke 2 custmcare,they cud not do anything other than refund,bt this ws really a bad experience,hd to burn incense sticks afterwards,If someone is really concerned they cn come here nd check,as here waste cn be disposed only inthe morning.Lesson learnt wll nvr ordr meat frm Instamart, willalso minimise purchase, nobody seems bothered, this is a serious offence,onlyin India this cn happen

body: Not received my order,shown delivered, delivery boy Akash Gautam Jadhav rejected my call 10 times, other customer care number unavailable, only chat bot is available for chat replying same statement again and again..lost my money.fraud app

title: Google Play Review
body: Instamart hasn't been available in my area for weeks now, it's very convenient. Why are only selected areas not able to use this service. It was working earlier and then it become unavailable in my area for no reason. Please bring it back.

title: Google Play Review
body: App and delivery person are too good in swiggy, issue is with customer support, for more than a month, trying to get back my valid refund, but all swiggy executives do is give another time period to wait, that's how I have waited for 35+ days , still not able to get my money back, trying to resolve an issue with swiggy customer support is impossible, they just mentally harass the customer, so what is the benefit of being a member and a customer for so long...

title: Google Play Review
body: Till now my swiggy experience was awesome, but yesterday I placed an order which automatically got cancelled after 30mins. When I enquired about the same, the team informed me that the order has been cancelled from my end and they refused to issue my refund as well. Why will i cancel the order after being regular customer and well aware about the cancellation and refund policy. My refund of Rs. 521 is still pending.
